verses.text: (א) Blessed \add are\add* the undefiled in the way, Who walk in the law of the \sc Lord\sc*.
(א) Blessed \add are\add* they that keep his testimonies, \add And that\add* seek him with the whole heart.
(א) They also do no iniquity: They walk in his ways.
(א) Thou hast commanded \add us\add* To keep thy precepts diligently.
(א) O that my ways were directed To keep thy statutes!
(א) Then shall I not be ashamed, When I have respect unto all thy commandments.
(א) I will praise thee with uprightness of heart, When I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.
(א) I will keep thy statutes: O forsake me not utterly. BETH.
(ב) Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? By taking heed \add thereto\add* according to thy word.
(ב) With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.
(ב) Thy word have I hid in mine heart, That I might not sin against thee.
(ב) Blessed \add art\add* thou, O \sc Lord\sc*: Teach me thy statutes.
(ב) With my lips have I declared All the judgments of thy mouth.
(ב) I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, As \add much as\add* in all riches.
(ב) I will meditate in thy precepts, And have respect unto thy ways.
(ב) I will delight myself in thy statutes: I will not forget thy word. GIMEL.
(ג) Deal bountifully with thy servant, \add that\add* I may live, And keep thy word.
(ג) Open thou mine eyes, That I may behold wondrous \add things\add* out of thy law.
(ג) I \add am\add* a stranger in the earth: Hide not thy commandments from me.
(ג) My soul breaketh for the longing \add That it hath\add* unto thy judgments at all times.
(ג) Thou hast rebuked the proud \add that are\add* cursed, Which do err from thy commandments.
(ג) Remove from me reproach and contempt; For I have kept thy testimonies.
(ג) Princes also did sit \add and\add* speak against me: \add But\add* thy servant did meditate in thy statutes.
(ג) Thy testimonies also \add are\add* my delight \add And\add* my counsellers. DALETH.
(ד) My soul cleaveth unto the dust: Quicken thou me according to thy word.
(ד) I have declared my ways, and thou heardest me: Teach me thy statutes.
(ד) Make me to understand the way of thy precepts: So shall I talk of thy wondrous works.
(ד) My soul melteth for heaviness: Strengthen thou me according unto thy word.
(ד) Remove from me the way of lying: And grant me thy law graciously.
(ד) I have chosen the way of truth: Thy judgments have I laid \add before me\add*.
(ד) I have stuck unto thy testimonies: O \sc Lord\sc*, put me not to shame.
(ד) I will run the way of thy commandments, When thou shalt enlarge my heart. HE.
(ה) Teach me, O \sc Lord\sc*, the way of thy statutes; And I shall keep it \add unto\add* the end.
(ה) Give me understanding, and I shall keep thy law; Yea, I shall observe it with \add my\add* whole heart.
(ה) Make me to go in the path of thy commandments; For therein do I delight.
(ה) Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, And not to covetousness.
(ה) Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity; \add And\add* quicken thou me in thy way.
(ה) Stablish thy word unto thy servant, Who \add is devoted\add* to thy fear.
(ה) Turn away my reproach which I fear: For thy judgments \add are\add* good.
(ה) Behold, I have longed after thy precepts: Quicken me in thy righteousness. VAU.
(ו) Let thy mercies come also \add unto\add* me, O \sc Lord\sc*, \add Even\add* thy salvation, according to thy word.
(ו) So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me: For I trust in thy word.
(ו) And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth; For I have hoped in thy judgments.
(ו) So shall I keep thy law continually For ever and ever.
(ו) And I will walk at liberty: For I seek thy precepts.
(ו) I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings, And will not be ashamed.
(ו) And I will delight myself in thy commandments, Which I have loved.
(ו) My hands also will I lift up unto thy commandments, which I have loved; And I will meditate in thy statutes. ZAIN.
(ז) Remember the word unto thy servant, Upon which thou hast caused me to hope.
(ז) This \add is\add* my comfort in my affliction: For thy word hath quickened me.
(ז) The proud have had me greatly in derision: \add Yet\add* have I not declined from thy law.
(ז) I remembered thy judgments of old, O \sc Lord\sc*; And have comforted myself.
(ז) Horror hath taken hold upon me because of the wicked That forsake thy law.
(ז) Thy statutes have been my songs In the house of my pilgrimage.
(ז) I have remembered thy name, O \sc Lord\sc*, in the night, And have kept thy law.
(ז) This I had, Because I kept thy precepts. CHETH.
(ח) \add Thou art\add* my portion, O \sc Lord\sc*: I have said that \add I\add* would keep thy words.
(ח) I intreated thy favour with \add my\add* whole heart: Be merciful unto me according to thy word.
(ח) I thought on my ways, And turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
(ח) I made haste, and delayed not To keep thy commandments.
(ח) The bands of the wicked have robbed me: \add But\add* I have not forgotten thy law.
(ח) At midnight I will rise to give thanks unto thee Because of thy righteous judgments.
(ח) I \add am\add* a companion of all \add them\add* that fear thee, And of them that keep thy precepts.
(ח) The earth, O \sc Lord\sc*, is full \add of\add* thy mercy: Teach me thy statutes. TETH.
(ט) Thou hast dealt well with thy servant, O \sc Lord\sc*, according unto thy word.
(ט) Teach me good judgment and knowledge: For I have believed thy commandments.
(ט) Before I was afflicted I went astray: But now have I kept thy word.
(ט) Thou \add art\add* good, and doest good; Teach me thy statutes.
(ט) The proud have forged a lie against me: \add But\add* I will keep thy precepts with \add my\add* whole heart.
(ט) Their heart is as fat as grease; \add But\add* I delight \add in\add* thy law.
(ט) \add It is\add* good for me that I have been afflicted; That I might learn thy statutes.
(ט) The law of thy mouth \add is\add* better unto me Than thousands of gold and silver. JOD.
(י) Thy hands have made me and fashioned me: Give me understanding, that I may learn thy commandments.
(י) They that fear thee will be glad when they see me; Because I have hoped in thy word.
(י) I know, O \sc Lord\sc*, that thy judgments \add are\add* right, And \add that\add* thou \add in\add* faithfulness hast afflicted me.
(י) Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness be for my comfort, According to thy word unto thy servant.
(י) Let thy tender mercies come \add unto\add* me, that I may live: For thy law \add is\add* my delight.
(י) Let the proud be ashamed; for they dealt perversely with me without a cause: \add But\add* I will meditate in thy precepts.
(י) Let those that fear thee turn unto me, And those that have known thy testimonies.
(י) Let my heart be sound in thy statutes; That I be not ashamed. CAPH.
(כ) My soul fainteth for thy salvation: \add But\add* I hope in thy word.
(כ) Mine eyes fail for thy word, Saying, When wilt thou comfort me?
(כ) For I am become like a bottle in the smoke; \add Yet\add* do I not forget thy statutes.
(כ) How many \add are\add* the days of thy servant? When wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me?
(כ) The proud have digged pits for me, Which \add are\add* not after thy law.
(כ) All thy commandments \add are\add* faithful: They persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.
(כ) They had almost consumed me upon earth; But I forsook not thy precepts.
(כ) Quicken me after thy lovingkindness; So shall I keep the testimony of thy mouth. LAMED.
(ל) For ever, O \sc Lord\sc*, Thy word \add is\add* settled in heaven.
(ל) Thy faithfulness \add is\add* unto all generations: Thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.
(ל) They continue \add this\add* day according to thine ordinances: For all \add are\add* thy servants.
(ל) Unless thy law \add had been\add* my delights, I should then have perished in mine affliction.
(ל) I will never forget thy precepts: For with them thou hast quickened me.
(ל) I \add am\add* thine, save me; For I have sought thy precepts.
(ל) The wicked have waited for me to destroy me: \add But\add* I will consider thy testimonies.
(ל) I have seen an end of all perfection: \add But\add* thy commandment \add is\add* exceeding broad. MEM.
(מ) O how love I thy law! It \add is\add* my meditation all the day.
(מ) Thou \add through\add* thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies: For they \add are\add* ever with me.
(מ) I have more understanding than all my teachers: For thy testimonies \add are\add* my meditation.
(מ) I understand more than the ancients, Because I keep thy precepts.
(מ) I have refrained my feet from every evil way, That I might keep thy word.
(מ) I have not departed from thy judgments: For thou hast taught me.
(מ) How sweet are thy words unto my taste! \add Yea, sweeter\add* than honey to my mouth!
(מ) Through thy precepts I get understanding: Therefore I hate every false way. NUN.
(נ) Thy word \add is\add* a lamp unto my feet, And a light unto my path.
(נ) I have sworn, and I will perform \add it\add*, That \add I\add* will keep thy righteous judgments.
(נ) I am afflicted very much: Quicken me, O \sc Lord\sc*, according unto thy word.
(נ) Accept, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings of my mouth, O \sc Lord\sc*, And teach me thy judgments.
(נ) My soul \add is\add* continually in my hand: Yet do I not forget thy law.
(נ) The wicked have laid a snare for me: Yet I erred not from thy precepts.
(נ) Thy testimonies have I taken as an heritage for ever: For they \add are\add* the rejoicing of my heart.
(נ) I have inclined mine heart to perform thy statutes Alway, \add even unto\add* the end. SAMECH.
(ס) I hate \add vain\add* thoughts: But thy law do I love.
(ס) Thou \add art\add* my hiding place and my shield: I hope in thy word.
(ס) Depart from me, ye evildoers: For I will keep the commandments of my God.
(ס) Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: And let me not be ashamed of my hope.
(ס) Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe: And I will have respect unto thy statutes continually.
(ס) Thou hast trodden down all them that err from thy statutes: For their deceit \add is\add* falsehood.
(ס) Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth \add like\add* dross: Therefore I love thy testimonies.
(ס) My flesh trembleth for fear of thee; And I am afraid of thy judgments. AIN.
(ע) I have done judgment and justice: Leave me not to mine oppressors.
(ע) Be surety for thy servant for good: Let not the proud oppress me.
(ע) Mine eyes fail for thy salvation, And for the word of thy righteousness.
(ע) Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy, And teach me thy statutes.
(ע) I \add am\add* thy servant; give me understanding, That I may know thy testimonies.
(ע) \add It is\add* time for \add thee\add*, \sc Lord\sc*, to work: \add For\add* they have made void thy law.
(ע) Therefore I love thy commandments Above gold; yea, above fine gold.
(ע) Therefore I esteem all \add thy\add* precepts concerning all \add things\add* to be right; \add And\add* I hate every false way. PE.
(פ) Thy testimonies \add are\add* wonderful: Therefore doth my soul keep them.
(פ) The entrance of thy words giveth light; It giveth understanding unto the simple.
(פ) I opened my mouth, and panted: For I longed for thy commandments.
(פ) Look thou upon me, and be merciful unto me, As thou usest to do unto those that love thy name.
(פ) Order my steps in thy word: And let not any iniquity have dominion over me.
(פ) Deliver me from the oppression of man: So will I keep thy precepts.
(פ) Make thy face to shine upon thy servant; And teach me thy statutes.
(פ) Rivers of waters run down mine eyes, Because they keep not thy law. TZADDI.
(צ) Righteous \add art\add* thou, O \sc Lord\sc*, And upright \add are\add* thy judgments.
(צ) Thy testimonies \add that\add* thou hast commanded \add are\add* righteous And very faithful.
(צ) My zeal hath consumed me, Because mine enemies have forgotten thy words.
(צ) Thy word \add is\add* very pure: Therefore thy servant loveth it.
(צ) I \add am\add* small and despised: \add Yet\add* do not I forget thy precepts.
(צ) Thy righteousness \add is\add* an everlasting righteousness, And thy law \add is\add* the truth.
(צ) Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me: \add Yet\add* thy commandments \add are\add* my delights.
(צ) The righteousness of thy testimonies \add is\add* everlasting: Give me understanding, and I shall live. KOPH.
(ק) I cried with \add my\add* whole heart; Hear me, O \sc Lord\sc*: I will keep thy statutes.
(ק) I cried unto thee; save me, And I shall keep thy testimonies.
(ק) I prevented the dawning of the morning, and cried: I hoped in thy word.
(ק) Mine eyes prevent the \add night\add* watches, That \add I\add* might meditate in thy word.
(ק) Hear my voice according unto thy lovingkindness: O \sc Lord\sc*, quicken me according to thy judgment.
(ק) They draw nigh that follow after mischief: They are far from thy law.
(ק) Thou \add art\add* near, O \sc Lord\sc*; And all thy commandments \add are\add* truth.
(ק) Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old That thou hast founded them for ever. RESH.
(ר) Consider mine affliction, and deliver me: For I do not forget thy law.
(ר) Plead my cause, and deliver me: Quicken me according to thy word.
(ר) Salvation \add is\add* far from the wicked: For they seek not thy statutes.
(ר) Great \add are\add* thy tender mercies, O \sc Lord\sc*: Quicken me according to thy judgments.
(ר) Many \add are\add* my persecutors and mine enemies; \add Yet\add* do I not decline from thy testimonies.
(ר) I beheld the transgressors, and was grieved; Because they kept not thy word.
(ר) Consider how I love thy precepts: Quicken me, O \sc Lord\sc*, according to thy lovingkindness.
(ר) Thy word \add is\add* true \add from\add* the beginning: And every one of thy righteous judgments \add endureth\add* for ever. SCHIN.
(ש) Princes have persecuted me without a cause: But my heart standeth in awe of thy word.
(ש) I rejoice at thy word, As one that findeth great spoil.
(ש) I hate and abhor lying: \add But\add* thy law do I love.
(ש) Seven \add times\add* a day do I praise thee Because of thy righteous judgments.
(ש) Great peace have they which love thy law: And nothing \add shall\add* offend them.
(ש) \sc Lord\sc*, I have hoped for thy salvation, And done thy commandments.
(ש) My soul hath kept thy testimonies; And \add I\add* love them exceedingly.
(ש) I have kept thy precepts and thy testimonies: For all my ways \add are\add* before thee. TAU.
(ת) Let my cry come near before thee, O \sc Lord\sc*: Give me understanding according to thy word.
(ת) Let my supplication come before thee: Deliver me according to thy word.
(ת) My lips shall utter praise, When thou hast taught me thy statutes.
(ת) My tongue shall speak of thy word: For all thy commandments \add are\add* righteousness.
(ת) Let thine hand help me; For I have chosen thy precepts.
(ת) I have longed for thy salvation, O \sc Lord\sc*; And thy law \add is\add* my delight.
(ת) Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; And let thy judgments help me.
(ת) I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; For I do not forget thy commandments.
